name: MasterChef
0:
”Alexa open Master Chef”
”Alexa ask Master Chef what I can make with chicken potato and tomato”
”Alexa ask Master Chef how to cook fried rice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: master chef
des:
Master Chef is a recipe finder, which helps you search for recipes by ingredients. With more than 500,000 recipes in its database, it suggests you appropriate dishes that you can make with help the ingredients you already have at your home.  As you keep on adding more and more available ingredients, Master Chef refines the search results based on each new item you include. Moreover,  you can narrow down search results by mentioning the type of meal you want to make (such as soups, salads, lunch etc.) or the type of cuisine like you like (such as American, Indian, Chinese etc.). 

Here are some things you can ask Alexa for:
- “Alexa, ask Master Chef what I can make with chicken, carrot, and beans"
- “Alexa, ask Master Chef  how to prepare chocolate chip cookie recipe”

Master Chef skill also helps the users with instructions for each step as you prepare a dish. Moreover, It’s also a handy tool to search for recipes of any cuisine for any course of the meal (such as breakfast, lunch, dinner etc. ). Just say:

- “Alexa, ask Master Chef how to cook fried rice of Chinese cuisine for dinner”
- "Alexa, ask Master Chef to search for Lamb Chops with Rosemary Flageolets recipe"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
